title: 3rd Class
plot: Coming from two different social spectrum's, the daughter of a rich home minister falls in love with a charming mechanic and together they deal with her family's reaction towards their relationship.

7HILLS STUDIO is the banner and launching a new Kannada movie by name _3rd Class_ (qv). The movie is going to be released in all over Karnataka. This story is all about the Movie is all about a Family Sentiment (Extraordinary bond Between a Father and his Daughter), Musical Oriented, Humorous Comedy, Beautiful Triangle Love Story and the real meaning of Friendship. The movie title is 3rd class .
